Skip to main content 
Welcome to Dragon Palace Bistro

The best Chinese food in Daniel Island, SC
Order Pickup shopping-basket-smile-1 Check Our Popular Dishes 
Gallery
Where We Started 
Our Story

Dragon Palace Bistro Restaurant offers authentic and delicious tasting Chinese cuisine in Daniel Island, SC. Dragon Palace Bistro's convenient location and affordable prices make our restaurant a natural choice for eat-in or take-out meals in the Daniel Island community. Our restaurant is known for its variety in taste and high quality fresh ingredients. Come and experience our friendly atmosphere and excellent service.

Featured Dishes

Menu

Appetizers
Pork Egg Roll $2.75 Crispy Vegetable Spring Rolls (2) $6.30 Chinese Bread (4) $6.30 Crispy String Beans $6.30 Shanghai Cucumbers $6.30 Crispy Crab Puffs (4) $7.40 Seafood Rolls (2) $8.50 Asparagus Stuffed Shrimp (2) $8.50 Ginger Crispy Shrimp $8.50 Scallion Steak Pancake $9.60 Salt & Pepper Calamari $10.20 Honey Glazed Roast Pork $10.20 Lettuce Wrap $13.20 Dragon Palace Sampler $21.45

Chicken

Meat

Seafood
Glazed Grand Marnier Shrimp $22.00 Salt & Pepper Shrimp $22.00 Walnut Shrimp $22.00 Whole Fish $26.00 Dragonfly Fish $26.50 Seafood Bird Nest $28.00 Wok Seared Chilean Sea Bass $30.50 Broccoli Shrimp $22.00 
Vegetarian
Sauteed Spinach w. Fresh Garlic $16.50 Buddha's Feast $16.50 Tofu w. Mushroom $16.50 Chinese Eggplant $16.50 Szechuan Tofu $16.50 Sauteed String Beans $16.50 
Tradition Varieties
Mongolian $18.00 Sesame $18.00 Garlic $18.00 Stir-Fry Vegetables w. Brown Sauce $18.00 Stir-Fry Vegetables w. White Sauce $18.00 Szechuan $18.00 Curry $18.00 Mandarin Orange $18.00 
Family Dinner
Family Dinner For Two $54.50 Family Dinner For Four $107.00 Family Dinner For Six $159.00 Family Dinner For Eight $216.00 
Lunch Menu
Buddha's Feast w. White Sauce $12.99 Buddha's Feast w. Brown Sauce $12.99 Chinese Eggplant w. White Sauce $12.99 Chinese Eggplant w. Brown Sauce $12.99 Ma Po Tofu w. White Sauce $12.99 Ma Po Tofu w. Brown Sauce $12.99 Mongolian Beef $12.99 Mandarin Orange Chicken $12.99 Mandarin Orange Beef $12.99 Sauteed Rib Eye Kew $12.99 Sweet & Tangy Pork Loin $12.99 Chicken w. String Beans $12.99 General Tso's Chicken $12.99 Sesame Chicken $12.99 Chicken w. Stir-fried Vegetables $12.99 Cashew Chicken $12.99 
Side
Lo Mein $6.90 Steamed Broccoli $6.90 Stir Fried Broccoli $6.90 Sauteed Asparagus $8.00 Crispy Tofu $8.00 Edamame $8.00 View Full Menu tools-kitchen-serving-dome What our customers say 
Reviews

Top tier! The food I ordered was outstanding. I can’t stand food that is over-salted and the Mongolian beef and Ginger shrimp were great! I look forward to coming back.
Brian Mitchell 
Finally managed to stop in and try this place yesterday. Everything was so tasty. The lunch special was an incredible deal. The amount of food for that price is hard to beat.
J M 
Good service, attentive staff. The food was delicious and tasted fresh. Portions are generous. Prices are reasonable for portions. Definitely not an average Chinese restaurant.
Bogdan Dusa 
Excellent food with some of the “rarest” Chinese dishes you can find in the US. The food is wonderfully made, not too heavy, not greasy, and all are appropriately portioned.
David Wong 
Absolutely fantastic Chinese cuisine. I was very happy with the way that everything was organized. And Not to mention, the food was absolutely fantastic! Highly recommended!
Glider RS 
The food was amazing. The hot and sour soup was delicious and just spicy enough, the crispy crab was crazy good! If in the mood for Chinese, this is the place to go!
Keith Driscoll
